entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -22.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 09:50 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -22.6°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -26.5°C
Wind: SSE 24 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:52 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 08:52 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
